text: Erzurum is a city in eastern Anatolia, Turkey. It is the capital and largest city in Erzurum Province. The 2000 census showed 361,235 people lived there with a Kurdish minority based on the south side. The number of people increased to 367,250 by 2010. == Other websites == Category:Cities in Turkey Category:Eastern Anatolia Region
title: Erzurum
